title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and Jason Statham stroll hand-in-hand on their way to Elton John concert
text:
They have been in a committed relationship for almost a decade.

And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and her fiancé Jason Statham looked every inch the happy couple as they enjoyed an evening out at Elton John's concert at The Greek Theater in Los Angeles on Thursday.

The model, 32, and the action star, 52, both cut stylish figures as they made their way toward the venue for the singer's Rocketman: Live In Concert performance.

Out and about: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, 32, and Jason Statham, 52, enjoyed an evening out at Elton John's concert at The Greek Theater in Los Angeles on Thursday

Rosie donned a black crop top and high-waisted black trousers for the couple's date which she paired with a knee-length coat.

The Transformers star added height to her frame with a pair of black heels and added a touch of glamour to her look with a gold necklace.

Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Rosie completed her look with a black handbag.

Jason looked dapper in a black cardigan and shirt while he also sported matching trousers and black boots.

Night on the town: The model and the action star both cut stylish figures as they made their way toward the venue for the singer's Rocketman: Live In Concert performance

Style: Rosie donned a black crop top and high-waisted black trousers for the couple's date which she paired with a knee-length coat

Rosie has been in a long-term relationship with Jason since 2010 and the couple welcomed son Jack, two, into the world in June 2017.

In June, the model spoke candidly about the impact of motherhood on her confidence as she graced the June cover of Harper's Bazaar magazine.

She said: 'Since becoming a mum, I've felt so much more confident within my own skin and much more confident about who I am. It's been life-changing.'

The model previously opened up about her relationship with the action star to Elle Australia in February.

'We just kind of get on with things. We're pretty normal - we're not leaving restaurants separately,' she said. 'People want to live on camera 24/7 but that's not us.'
description: The couple enjoyed an evening out at Elton John's concert at The Greek Theater in Los Angeles on Thursday.
